text: Hey team, looking to work with Ryan Allen for Pizza Hut. Budget is approx $20,438 - need 2 x Blog post, 2 x Pinterest pin, 3 x Instagram story, 1 x Podcast guest, 1 x 60-second YouTube video. 7 weeks exclusivity, 3 month engagement. Usage: 12 months. Start date: November 2025. Need to confirm: usage rights
